name: Inphodrive
tag_list: smartphone, mobile-internet, entertainment, telematics, 3g, voice, road-safety, location-based-services
overview:
Our company provides interactive mobile platform for Internet access and messaging for drivers behind the wheel.

Using his natural voice, the driver can exchange e-mails, connect to social networks, browse news portals, search for locations, access on-demand music services and much more. Inphodrive product addresses millions of drivers worldwide who spend hours in the traffic each day. These drivers are craving for a solution which would allow them to stay online while driving, being both productive and safe.

Information is created by server in special voice format, focused on providing driver with simple, intuitive environment for safer driving.

On the driver side a client application is installed on Smartphone. It accesses the server via 3G mobile Internet connection and enables voice interaction between the driver and the Internet content.

Proposed platform creates a new voice cloud that will be opened for developers’ community.
